item.description:
November's Raw Maine potluck is tackling that age-old issue: how to thrive (not just survive!) during the holidays. Bring your favourite holiday-themed dish and let's chat about some techniques we use to thrive!

Please bring a raw vegan dish to share and come in comfy clothes. Additional guests are welcome! Fresh local spring water, iced and hot herbal tea, dishes, cutlery, etc. will be provided. If you need directions, call or email me.

And I promise to make something decadent and nummy! Mmmm!

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Doin' Holidays Raw-Style
